ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed, if you only knew with the Knowledge of Certainty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And yet if you knew with positive knowledge
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nay, would that you knew with certainty of knowledge (what your attitude will lead to, you would never have acted the way you do).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You will certainly have the knowledge of your deeds beyond all doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Yes certainly, if you had believed with certainty, you would not have craved for wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! If you knew with a sure knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! if you had known with a certain knowledge,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed; did you know with the knowledge of certainty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, would that ye knew (now) with a sure knowledge!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed, were you to know the truth with certainty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Lo! would that ye knew now with the surety of knowledge!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, were you to know with certain knowledge,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, were ye to know with certainty of mind, (ye would beware!)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! If you knew with a sure knowledge (the end result of piling up, you would not have occupied yourselves in worldly things)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, did you know with certain knowledge
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: If you knew with knowledge of certainty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [102:5] No indeed! — verily — Were you to know with certain knowledge, the consequences of your vainglory, you would not preoccupy yourselves with it, [for]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, would that ye knew (now)) what will be done to you on the Day of Judgement (with a sure knowledge!) what you bragged about in the life of the world!
